member.name: M:Triton.Location.Model.Address.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the Name. the default format is prefix{p} first{f} middle{m} last{l} suffix{s}.
member.param: the following formatting directives can be used to create a different result example ToString("{l}, {f} {m}") ==> Smith, Jim R. {l1} the Address.Line1 value {l2} the Address.Line2 value {l3} the Address.Line3 value {c} the Address.CityName value {s} the Address.StateName value {p} the Address.PostalCodeName value {la} the Address.GeoLocation.Latitude value {lo} the Address.GeoLocation.Longitude value {gps} the Address.GeoLocation.ToString() value
member.returns: The formatted string of the name.

member.name: M:Triton.Location.Model.Address.ToString
member.summary: Formats the Name in the default format (prefix first middle last suffix).
member.returns: The formatted string of the name.

member.name: T:Triton.Location.Support.Request.Deserialize
member.summary: Helper class to take parameters from the request and generate objects to save/update. For use with Triton.Location module.
